title: Own every champ, but can no longer re-roll champion shards
body: So yeah, I own every single champ and I re-roll three shards every time a new champion comes out. Does this mean that with the new update I'll have to either get lucky and get the right shard or disenchant champions until I earn enough blue essence to purchase the new champion??

replies.body: Champion reroll feature has been removed in the new system.

> [{quoted}](name=Wean,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=HIhBbXoe,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-11-24T05:30:55.179+0000)
>
> Champion reroll feature has been removed in the new system.

that is a real shame - I always saw that as a default reward for long-time players sticking with the game. They get first crack at a new champ and it gets lots of use on the rift. I guess the aim is to sell them though - cant be giving shit away to long time players who have dropped a tonne of cash on the game.

wait, you cant answer in binary for a multiple choice question.

Q: is it (a) or is it (b)

It isn't a multiple choice question? He asked if disenchanting/getting lucky with shards was the only way to get the new champ, to which the answer is yes.
